text: Aap keh dijiye kay meray pass to aik daleel hai meray rab ki taraf say aur tum iss ki takzeeb kertay ho jiss cheez ki tum jald baazi ker rahey ho woh meray pass nahi. Hukum kissi ka nahi ba-juz Allah Taalaa kay Allah Taalaa waqaee baat ko batla deta hai aur sab say acha faisla kerney wala wohi hai
